images.description: Using only black and white, I was able showcase my blending and shading skills.
My very first creation on procreate. This was from halloween in freshman year.
Was given a photo from Mrs. Leonard's wedding. Incroprated black and white for shading and did a magenta siloutte as the background. All of her bridesmaids wore magenta at the wedding.
Drew the two of them because they are my favorite characters from my favorite show, Greys Anatmoy.
Drew her for Black History Month at school. She is an extremely influential human being and deserves to be remembered for all she has done.
I chose a parrot because I love the colors that are on a parrot.
